title: Operation: Special Warfare
overview: In order to defeat the latest in terrorist factions, a very elite unite is created of 14 of the most skilled young military personnel from around the country. The team is called "Blue Lightening Commandos" and are led by Captain Qin Guan, a no-nonsense, hard-ball leader with a much softer interior and good heart. Though he doesn't show it all the time, he cares very much about his team and wants them to become the best of the best. He trains them hard but with a focus on safety and learning to trust each other.Â
